aspects: Mana Addict Turned Martial Arts Master (Spellbreaker / Monk)
Scent of Sorcery, Hunger in the Blood (spell-saturation triggers Dracon'Thor'reth)
Taran’Zhu Taught Me What Was Wrong With Me (And How to Live Anyway)
The Dragonseal Mirror (They Compare Me to Ama’thar)
stunts: Flow Like Water — Redirecting Spiral: Defend vs. melee with Athletics at +2 when able to move; on succeed with style, may redirect up to 2 shifts onto another enemy in zone (they may defend).

Sha’do-Pan Parkour: Once per exchange, traverse up to 2 zones / secure high ground without an Overcome if terrain permits; if blocked, Overcome with Athletics at +2; gain a Boost when ending in advantageous position.
Mana-Quenching Palm: Once per scene, replace Fight attack stress with Create Advantage Drained / Interrupted Casting with one free invoke on a valid target.
Breath of Yu’lon: Once per exchange, impose -2 on an attacker you can perceive for this exchange.
Extra Technique — Flurry of Blows: Once per exchange, Fight Attack up to 3 targets in zone with one roll; 2nd/3rd targets get +1 to defend.
Suroe Dragonseal.notes: Spell-saturation can trigger Trouble; prefer Athletics to Defend when moving/evading and Fight to Defend when standing ground.
